name: tm49
effect: Teaches Snatch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Snatch Gen II: Fury Cutter Gen I: Tri Attack)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Steals the effects of the move the foe is trying to use.
flavor_text.emerald: Steals the effects of the move the foe is trying to use.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Steals the effects of the foe’s healing or status- changing move.
